description:
The fight between Kou Hiko and Bunchu is stopped when Prince Yinxiao and Prince Yinhhong decide to be taken back to Chouka. However, Genshitenson has Hakutsuru Doji take them to Mount Kunlun. Taikoubou`s group have made it to Seiki Castle, but Taikoubou himself goes off on his own.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Taikoubou Encounters Ki Shou, Lord of the West
Taikoubou, Seihakukou Kishou to Kaikou Su
Taikun rencontre le seigneur Chi Chan
太公望, 西伯侯姫昌と邂逅す
